name: Weird Wizarding Baseball
description:
Use WASD to move and Left Click to send anything in your way flying.

The "baseballs" aren't what they seem, rumored to be a mysterious creature that multiplies after biting any living thing that comes into contact.  They seem to be able to store magic that was sent through them allowing them to be cast alight and sent flinging at enemies.  

The main danger is yourself, the more you take damage or damage enemies, the more baseball creatures are within range waiting for contact to continue the cycle.  Finish fights quickly and effectively before the chaos of infinite murderous baseballs spirals out of control.

Wanted to put a couple more bosses but alas, poor time management, maybe next time!
